1011010100100110 0010101010011011 1 -> sum: 1101111111000010, cout: 0
0011110001011000 0100101001110101 0 -> sum: 1000011011001101, cout: 0

0010110011000110 1100100111001100 0 -> sum: 1111011010010010, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
